definition: eye/small hole/crux (of a matter)/CL:隻|只[zhi1],雙|双[shuang1]/classifier for big hollow things (wells, stoves, pots etc)
thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)

sentences.english: Can you use lipstick on your eyes?
sentences.chinese: 把脣線筆當作眼線筆使用或者反一反？

sentences.english: Hold applicator at a slight angle and apply color to the base of the lashes.
sentences.chinese: 以稍微傾斜的角度拿着眼線筆，從睫毛的根部上色。

sentences.english: Liquid liner is easier to apply than you think.
sentences.chinese: 眼線液比你想象中的易用。

sentences.english: Fred is a nark. He squealed.
sentences.chinese: 弗雷德是警方的眼線，是他告的密。

sentences.english: Glamour rating? It's all about the caked on eyeliner and chain-smoked cigarettes here.
sentences.chinese: 魅力指數？全都是結塊的眼線妝和連續不斷的香菸。

sentences.english: Also, make full use of the quality of a good eyeliner, waterproof effect will be better.
sentences.chinese: 還有，儘量使用品質好的眼線筆，防水效果會更好些。

sentences.english: There are different types of kohl.
It's all about the caked on eyeliner and chain-smoked cigarettes here.
sentences.chinese: 全都是結塊的眼線妝和連續不斷的香菸。

sentences.english: The quick drying formula means it won't smudge.
sentences.chinese: 獨特的超快乾配方，讓你的眼線不會暈染或結塊。

sentences.english: NO08,3. I need to apply some more eyeliner and lipstick.
sentences.chinese: 我需要多上一點眼線和口紅。

sentences.english: For thicker application, apply at a flat angle.
sentences.chinese: 將眼線筆平角勾畫便可描繪出一條較粗的眼線。

sentences.english: For thicker application, apply at a flat angle.
sentences.chinese: 將眼線筆平角勾畫便可描繪出一條較粗的眼線。

sentences.english: He gropes again in his pocket and finds his girlfriend’s eyeliner.
sentences.chinese: 他在此摸索他的口袋並且發現了他女朋友的眼線筆。

sentences.english: The launch of the brand and a limited edition "shimmer" eye "liner" and triple.
sentences.chinese: 該品牌推出了限量版微光眼線液和一個三重奏。

definition: (of a woman) to adorn oneself/makeup/adornment/trousseau/stage makeup and costume
to remove makeup/(old) to take off formal dress and ornaments
